This collaboration aims to provide BIT.STORE users with a secure and simple financial service experience. TUSD is known for its reliability, being pegged to the US dollar and offering transparency through third-party verified real-time attestations of its reserve holdings. The partnership is part of BIT.STORE's efforts to expand its service portfolio, which includes plans for a mobile app, an ambassador program, and additional top-up options. Meanwhile, TUSD experienced a temporary de-pegging, dropping to $0.9712 before nearing its stable value again at $0.9905.

detailed_analysis.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Stability Wavers as Value Falls Below $1 Peg
detailed_analysis.body: Stablecoin TrueUSD (TUSD) has experienced a significant devaluation, dropping below its $1 peg to around $0.97, amid a massive sell-off on Binance. Over the past five days, TUSD has seen net outflows of $279 million. The instability began on January 15 when traders sold over $300 million worth of TUSD for USDT. Experts like Ashton Addison and Carlos Mercado have expressed concerns over the stablecoin's ability to maintain its peg and the importance of monitoring market cap versus liquidity. The sell-off may be linked to a recent $100 million exploit on the Poloniex exchange. The situation has raised questions about TUSD's stability and the confidence of users in the stablecoin market.

detailed_analysis.title: Suspected Market Maneuvers by Whales Including Justin Sun to Stabilize TUSD Peg
detailed_analysis.body: It is suspected that two whales, including Justin Sun, bought TUSD to restore its peg. On January 18th, whale TT2T17, allegedly Justin Sun, destroyed 104 million TUSD after detaching, and then deposited 200 million USDT into Binance, and withdrew 139.56 million TUSD from Binance. Another whale, TGIWRO, withdrew 31.6 million TUSD from Binance and deposited it into JustLend after detaching, then borrowed 18.97 million SDT from JustLend and deposited it into Binance.

detailed_analysis.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Depegging Raises Concerns, Impact on Major Cryptos and ScapesMania Presale Highlighted
detailed_analysis.body: The cryptocurrency market is facing challenges as the stablecoin TrueUSD (TUSD) loses its peg to the dollar, trading below its intended 1:1 value. This depegging began around January 15 and has led to over $340 million worth of TUSD being sold in the last 24 hours, causing concerns about the stability of TUSD's reserves. Other major cryptocurrencies like Polygon (MATIC), Solana (SOL), and Polkadot (DOT) may also be affected by this instability. Meanwhile, ScapesMania (MANIA), a presale gaming ecosystem project, is gaining attention for its potential in the crypto market. Polygon (MATIC) is experiencing fluctuations and partnerships, while Solana (SOL) is preparing for the altcoin season with its high throughput and low transaction costs. Polkadot (DOT) is maintaining momentum with growth in its staking ecosystem and transactional activities, despite a recent bearish trend in price.

According to a BlockBeats report on January 16th, MooreHK has begun its partnership with the network firm, integrating their technology solutions. detailed_analysis.title: True USD (TUSD) Depreciates Below $1 Peg Amidst Market Concerns and Binance's Shift in Focus
detailed_analysis.body: True USD (TUSD), the fifth-largest stablecoin, has fallen below its $1 peg, marking the deepest drop since its launch six years ago. Market observers noted a significant increase in TUSD sell orders on Binance, with nearly $128 million flowing out of the exchange. Concurrently, Tether (USDT) experienced an increase in capital, suggesting a shift in preference among investors. Concerns about TUSD's under-collateralization arose due to difficulties in accessing real-time attestations of its reserves. Binance's decision to exclude TUSD from its Manta Launchpad and the removal of zero-fee trading for TUSD have contributed to the stablecoin's decline, while Binance's new stablecoin, FDUSD, has seen growth.

detailed_analysis.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Drops to $0.99 Following Binance Launchpad Project Announcement
detailed_analysis.body: TrueUSD (TUSD) has experienced a slight depeg from its usual $1 value, dropping to $0.99. This devaluation occurred after Binance, a major cryptocurrency exchange, announced its 44th Launchpad project, Manta, without including TUSD as one of the stakable cryptocurrencies. Instead, BNB and FDUSD were selected for the project. The exclusion of TUSD from the project appears to have led to a negative reaction from some users, resulting in a sell-off that drove the price down. Notably, TUSD has not seen a drop to this level in the past year. Meanwhile, FDUSD, another stablecoin promoted by Binance after the shelving of BUSD, has seen its market value surpass TUSD, and its price has risen slightly above the norm, similar to the increase observed in BNB.

detailed_analysis.title: KYVE Launches First Mainnet Data Pool: Cosmos Hub, Activating Its Protocol Layer

This data pool will provide trustless data to interchain builders, validators, and other participants, making it easier for them to access historical blockchain data. The pool will also support secure data analysis and be beneficial for interchain hackathons and grant programs. KYVE's protocol layer consists of data pools, with each pool having 50 open protocol validator slots. The data is stored using Bundlr, which provides instant finality for Arweave. The pool is funded by the KYVE Foundation and participants can join by holding $KYVE tokens.

detailed_analysis.title: Bitfinex Alpha | Bitcoin Stays Calm Despite CEX Lawsuits
detailed_analysis.body: US wholesale prices decline in May, indicating a potential slowdown in inflation. Supply chain disruptions and rising input costs may impact the economy.

detailed_analysis.title: Voice Input
detailed_analysis.body: The author reflects on their recent adoption of voice input on their smartphone, which they attribute to a dislike of typing on a small screen. They highlight the near-perfect speech-to-text recognition but admit to needing to learn how to format text and perform various functions. They anticipate that voice input will become a habit and foresee writing more blog posts using this method.

detailed_analysis.title: Airdrop | EtherMail Airdrop, First Web3 mailbox: Get EMC Tokens | by OxWeb3 | Jun, 2023 | Medium
detailed_analysis.body: EtherMail is a revolutionary email platform that combines web 2.0 and web 3.0 technologies, offering anonymous and encrypted wallet-to-wallet communication. Users have full ownership and control of their inbox and can earn rewards for reading relevant content. The platform also allows companies to send targeted content to asset holders based on real-time blockchain information. Users can earn EMC tokens by connecting their wallet, inviting friends, and reading emails. The platform recently raised $3M in a seed round and is currently in the beta testing phase.

detailed_analysis.title: The Secret Company That Owns the World…Has Entered the Bitcoin Market
detailed_analysis.body: Blackrock, the world's most influential investment company, has applied for a Bitcoin Spot ETF. If approved, this could bring legitimacy and billions of dollars into the Bitcoin market, pushing its price over $100k.

detailed_analysis.title: Bitcoin's Exchange Exodus: From Three-Year Low to Binance's Crypto Chaos!
detailed_analysis.body: Bitcoin supply on exchanges hits three-year low as traders opt for self-custody amid regulatory risks. Binance faces SEC charges, staff layoffs, Netherlands exit, and French investigation.

detailed_analysis.title: Blackrock’s Latest Move Proves the US Has No Intention to Kill Crypto
detailed_analysis.body: Blackrock's plan to launch a Bitcoin ETF suggests they are bullish on the future of crypto. Despite recent SEC actions against crypto, the government and Wall Street seem to be collaborating on the industry.

extracted_news.body: Binance will delist GNS/BTC and XVG/TUSD spot trading pairs on March 29th, according to an official announcement. The decision comes as a result of a recent review.

According to BlockBeats news, on March 23, according to CoinGecko data, the market value of TUSD has dropped from US$1.29 billion to the current US$618 million since March 15, a decrease of 52.09%.

extracted_news.body: TUSD has now resumed its peg and is currently trading at $0.9969. According to BlockBeats news on February 29th, based on Binance market data, TUSD has now resumed its peg and is currently trading at 0.9969 US dollars, with a 24-hour increase of 3.06%.

extracted_news.title: Binance to Burn Large Amount of BUSD and TUSD B-Tokens
extracted_news.body: Binance announced on its social media platform that it will burn a large amount of BUSD and TUSD B-tokens today. It will then release an equivalent amount of tokens to be used as collateral on its native network. The announcement was reported by BlockBeats on February 22nd.

extracted_news.title: TUSD Listed on Indian Cryptocurrency Exchange CoinDCX
extracted_news.body: TUSD listed on Indian cryptocurrency exchange CoinDCX. BlockBeats news on February 4th: TUSD has been listed on Indian cryptocurrency exchange CoinDCX, offering a total of 20 trading pairs including BTC/TUSD, ETH/TUSD, SOL/TUSD, and BNB/TUSD, with plans for more collaborations in the future. CoinDCX is an Indian cryptocurrency exchange dedicated to providing simple crypto financial services to users, such as buying cryptocurrencies, wallet facilities, futures and margin trading, as well as staking and lending. It currently has over 14 million users.

extracted_news.title: TUSD Launches on Bitci T\u00fcrkiye with Exclusive Staking Event
extracted_news.body: TUSD has been listed on the Turkish cryptocurrency exchange platform Bitci T\u00fcrkiye. The announcement was made on January 22nd, with an exclusive staking activity scheduled from January 25th to April 15th. The launch supports TRC20, ERC20, and BEP20 networks, and the trading pairs available are TUSD/TRY and TUSD/USDT.

extracted_news.title: BIT.STORE Partners with TrueUSD to Offer TUSD for Card Recharge
extracted_news.body: BIT.STORE has announced a new partnership with TrueUSD (TUSD) to integrate the stablecoin as a recharge option for its crypto card services. This collaboration aims to provide BIT.STORE users with a secure and simple financial service experience. TUSD is known for its reliability, being pegged to the US dollar and offering transparency through third-party verified real-time attestations of its reserve holdings. The partnership is part of BIT.STORE's efforts to expand its service portfolio, which includes plans for a mobile app, an ambassador program, and additional top-up options. Meanwhile, TUSD experienced a temporary de-pegging, dropping to $0.9712 before nearing its stable value again at $0.9905.

extracted_news.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Stability Wavers as Value Falls Below $1 Peg
extracted_news.body: Stablecoin TrueUSD (TUSD) has experienced a significant devaluation, dropping below its $1 peg to around $0.97, amid a massive sell-off on Binance. Over the past five days, TUSD has seen net outflows of $279 million. The instability began on January 15 when traders sold over $300 million worth of TUSD for USDT. Experts like Ashton Addison and Carlos Mercado have expressed concerns over the stablecoin's ability to maintain its peg and the importance of monitoring market cap versus liquidity. The sell-off may be linked to a recent $100 million exploit on the Poloniex exchange. The situation has raised questions about TUSD's stability and the confidence of users in the stablecoin market.

extracted_news.title: Suspected Market Maneuvers by Whales Including Justin Sun to Stabilize TUSD Peg
extracted_news.body: It is suspected that two whales, including Justin Sun, bought TUSD to restore its peg. On January 18th, whale TT2T17, allegedly Justin Sun, destroyed 104 million TUSD after detaching, and then deposited 200 million USDT into Binance, and withdrew 139.56 million TUSD from Binance. Another whale, TGIWRO, withdrew 31.6 million TUSD from Binance and deposited it into JustLend after detaching, then borrowed 18.97 million SDT from JustLend and deposited it into Binance.

extracted_news.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Depegging Raises Concerns, Impact on Major Cryptos and ScapesMania Presale Highlighted
extracted_news.body: The cryptocurrency market is facing challenges as the stablecoin TrueUSD (TUSD) loses its peg to the dollar, trading below its intended 1:1 value. This depegging began around January 15 and has led to over $340 million worth of TUSD being sold in the last 24 hours, causing concerns about the stability of TUSD's reserves. Other major cryptocurrencies like Polygon (MATIC), Solana (SOL), and Polkadot (DOT) may also be affected by this instability. Meanwhile, ScapesMania (MANIA), a presale gaming ecosystem project, is gaining attention for its potential in the crypto market. Polygon (MATIC) is experiencing fluctuations and partnerships, while Solana (SOL) is preparing for the altcoin season with its high throughput and low transaction costs. Polkadot (DOT) is maintaining momentum with growth in its staking ecosystem and transactional activities, despite a recent bearish trend in price.

extracted_news.title: MooreHK Commences Auditing Services for TUSD, Reveals Reserve Fund Details
extracted_news.body: MooreHK, a well-known accounting firm, has officially started providing auditing services for TUSD. According to a BlockBeats report on January 16th, MooreHK has begun its partnership with the network firm, integrating their technology solutions. The upgraded audit report also disclosed further details about the reserve funds of TUSD held in custody by its financial and trust partners.

extracted_news.title: True USD (TUSD) Depreciates Below $1 Peg Amidst Market Concerns and Binance's Shift in Focus
extracted_news.body: True USD (TUSD), the fifth-largest stablecoin, has fallen below its $1 peg, marking the deepest drop since its launch six years ago. Market observers noted a significant increase in TUSD sell orders on Binance, with nearly $128 million flowing out of the exchange. Concurrently, Tether (USDT) experienced an increase in capital, suggesting a shift in preference among investors. Concerns about TUSD's under-collateralization arose due to difficulties in accessing real-time attestations of its reserves. Binance's decision to exclude TUSD from its Manta Launchpad and the removal of zero-fee trading for TUSD have contributed to the stablecoin's decline, while Binance's new stablecoin, FDUSD, has seen growth.

extracted_news.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Drops to $0.99 Following Binance Launchpad Project Announcement
extracted_news.body: TrueUSD (TUSD) has experienced a slight depeg from its usual $1 value, dropping to $0.99. This devaluation occurred after Binance, a major cryptocurrency exchange, announced its 44th Launchpad project, Manta, without including TUSD as one of the stakable cryptocurrencies. Instead, BNB and FDUSD were selected for the project. The exclusion of TUSD from the project appears to have led to a negative reaction from some users, resulting in a sell-off that drove the price down. Notably, TUSD has not seen a drop to this level in the past year. Meanwhile, FDUSD, another stablecoin promoted by Binance after the shelving of BUSD, has seen its market value surpass TUSD, and its price has risen slightly above the norm, similar to the increase observed in BNB.

extracted_news.title: Binance's Simple Earn Platform Launches TUSD Flexible Savings Product Campaign.
extracted_news.body: According to an official announcement from BlockBeats on January 10th, Binance's Simple Earn platform has launched a TUSD current product promotion. The participation method is first come, first served. During the promotion period, subscribing to the TUSD current product on the platform not only earns real-time annualized returns but also enjoys 8% exclusive additional graded annualized returns.

BlockBeats News, on December 26th, according to the official announcement, Binance's new coin mining has launched its 42nd project - Sleepless AI (AI), a Web3+AI gaming platform. 

Users can invest BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD into the AI mining pool on the Launchpad website after 08:00 on December 28th, 2023 (GMT+8) to receive AI rewards. AI can be mined for a total of 7 days. 

Binance will list Sleepless AI (AI) on January 4th, 2024 at 18:00 (GMT+8) and open AI/BTC, AI/USDT, AI/BNB, AI/FDUSD, AI/TUSD, and AI/TRY trading markets, applying seed label trading rules.

extracted_news.body: According to official sources on December 26th, TUSD can now be obtained through the Binance Web3 wallet, and users can trade TUSD on the four major networks of BSC, ETH, Arbitrum, and Avalanche. TrueUSD (TUSD) is the first stablecoin anchored to the US dollar and provides on-chain real-time verification by an independent third-party institution. It is currently listed on over 100 trading platforms such as Binance and HTX and is circulating on more than ten mainstream public chains, including Ethereum, Tron, Avalanche, BNB Chain, Fantom, and Polygon. extracted_news.title: launched on Binance's new coin mining Fair Mode, with NFPrompt (NFP) being mined using BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD
extracted_news.body:
BlockBeats news, on December 19th, according to official sources, Binance's new coin mining Fair Mode launched its 41st project, NFPrompt (NFP), which can be mined using BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD. Users can deposit BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD into the NFP mining pool on the Launchpad website after 08:00 on December 20th (UTC+8) to receive NFP rewards. NFP can be mined for a total of 7 days.

Fair Mode is a new mode launched by Binance Launchpool. The tokens issued under this mode will have a significantly increased initial circulation (all Launchpool tokens will be released before listing) to protect the community and retail investors and maximize user benefits. In addition, it will permanently block a portion of the allocation from entering circulation to further reduce inflationary pressures. For more details, please refer to the exploration of token economic models and development.

According to the Binance announcement, NFPrompt (NFP) is an AI-driven user-generated content (UGC) platform for Web3 creators.

The company has achieved numerous milestones, including partnerships with exchanges and liquidity providers, establishing institutional-grade infrastructure, and ensuring transparency through audits. extracted_news.title: KYVE Launches First Mainnet Data Pool: Cosmos Hub, Activating Its Protocol Layer
extracted_news.body: KYVE has launched its first mainnet data pool on the Cosmos Hub, enabling the archiving and validation of Cosmos Hub data in a decentralized manner. This data pool will provide trustless data to interchain builders, validators, and other participants, making it easier for them to access historical blockchain data. The pool will also support secure data analysis and be beneficial for interchain hackathons and grant programs. KYVE's protocol layer consists of data pools, with each pool having 50 open protocol validator slots. The data is stored using Bundlr, which provides instant finality for Arweave. The pool is funded by the KYVE Foundation and participants can join by holding $KYVE tokens.

extracted_news.title: Weekly Update - DeFi and Layer 1 & Layer 2 News (Week 25,15/06/2023 - 21/06/2023)
extracted_news.body: zkSync Era, a scaling solution for Ethereum, has reached over $500 million in total value locked (TVL), becoming the third-largest scaling solution. Other developments include a proposal to increase the maximum validator balance on Ethereum, Tether experiencing a dip below its dollar peg, and Uniswap naming preferred bridges for cross-chain deployments. Polkadot revamped its governance system, Polygon proposed an upgrade to its Proof-of-Stake chain, and Binance introduced opBNB, an EVM-compatible Layer-2 testnet chain. Frax Finance plans to launch its own Ethereum Layer-2 blockchain, and EigenLayer's restaking smart contracts reached their limit on the first day.

extracted_news.title: SlowMist: The Ultimate Guide to Supply Chain Security in the Web3 Industry
extracted_news.body: The SlowMist security team provides recommendations for enhancing supply chain security in the Web3 industry, focusing on source code security, build security, transmission security, artifact security, and deployment security. They suggest using code management solutions, conducting code scanning, implementing CI/CD, ensuring material security, automating the build process, controlling network access, verifying artifacts, and securing deployments. These measures aim to mitigate the risks of supply chain attacks and create a secure development environment for the Web3 industry.

extracted_news.title: Doge Takes On Big Crypto
extracted_news.body: BlackRock, the world's largest asset manager, has applied to launch a Bitcoin ETF, signaling the entrance of big money into digital currencies. This development makes Dogecoin more important as it offers a grassroots alternative to big crypto and is resistant to corporate control. While Bitcoin is being embraced by institutions, Dogecoin has the potential to become the preferred coin for the creator's economy, supporting independent journalists, artists, and other creators. With BlackRock's move, it becomes crucial to maintain Dogecoin's branding as "the people's crypto" to avoid replicating the failures of the current monetary system.

The protocol aims to provide a non-custodial solution for liquid staking, with node operators economically aligned to benefit stakers.

extracted_news.title: VirtuSwap Partners With bloXroute To Launch The First Polygon DEX With Built-In Frontrunning…
extracted_news.body: VirtuSwap partners with bloXroute to launch the first Polygon DEX with built-in frontrunning protection. The partnership integrates bloXroute's MEV Protect Engine into VirtuSwap's platform to protect users from losses caused by frontrunning and sandwich attacks. This collaboration ensures users have access to the best asset prices and lowest trading fees while safeguarding VirtuSwap's liquidity-rebalancing transactions. bloXroute's solution is versatile and can be used by retail traders, professional algo-traders, and integrated into DeFi projects and platforms.

detailed_analysis.title: TUSD Resumes Peg, Trading at $0.9969 with 3.06% Increase
detailed_analysis.body: TUSD has now resumed its peg and is currently trading at $0.9969. According to BlockBeats news on February 29th, based on Binance market data, TUSD has now resumed its peg and is currently trading at 0.9969 US dollars, with a 24-hour increase of 3.06%.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance to Burn Large Amount of BUSD and TUSD B-Tokens
detailed_analysis.body: Binance announced on its social media platform that it will burn a large amount of BUSD and TUSD B-tokens today. It will then release an equivalent amount of tokens to be used as collateral on its native network. The announcement was reported by BlockBeats on February 22nd.

detailed_analysis.title: TUSD Listed on Indian Cryptocurrency Exchange CoinDCX
detailed_analysis.body: TUSD listed on Indian cryptocurrency exchange CoinDCX. BlockBeats news on February 4th: TUSD has been listed on Indian cryptocurrency exchange CoinDCX, offering a total of 20 trading pairs including BTC/TUSD, ETH/TUSD, SOL/TUSD, and BNB/TUSD, with plans for more collaborations in the future. CoinDCX is an Indian cryptocurrency exchange dedicated to providing simple crypto financial services to users, such as buying cryptocurrencies, wallet facilities, futures and margin trading, as well as staking and lending. It currently has over 14 million users.

detailed_analysis.body: HTX turned off proof of reserves while TUSD, linked to HTX stakeholder Sun, loses dollar peg raising collateralization concerns

detailed_analysis.title: TUSD Launches on Bitci T\u00fcrkiye with Exclusive Staking Event
detailed_analysis.body: TUSD has been listed on the Turkish cryptocurrency exchange platform Bitci T\u00fcrkiye. The announcement was made on January 22nd, with an exclusive staking activity scheduled from January 25th to April 15th. The launch supports TRC20, ERC20, and BEP20 networks, and the trading pairs available are TUSD/TRY and TUSD/USDT.

detailed_analysis.title: BIT.STORE Partners with TrueUSD to Offer TUSD for Card Recharge
detailed_analysis.body: BIT.STORE has announced a new partnership with TrueUSD (TUSD) to integrate the stablecoin as a recharge option for its crypto card services. This collaboration aims to provide BIT.STORE users with a secure and simple financial service experience. TUSD is known for its reliability, being pegged to the US dollar and offering transparency through third-party verified real-time attestations of its reserve holdings. The partnership is part of BIT.STORE's efforts to expand its service portfolio, which includes plans for a mobile app, an ambassador program, and additional top-up options. Meanwhile, TUSD experienced a temporary de-pegging, dropping to $0.9712 before nearing its stable value again at $0.9905.

detailed_analysis.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Stability Wavers as Value Falls Below $1 Peg
detailed_analysis.body: Stablecoin TrueUSD (TUSD) has experienced a significant devaluation, dropping below its $1 peg to around $0.97, amid a massive sell-off on Binance. Over the past five days, TUSD has seen net outflows of $279 million. The instability began on January 15 when traders sold over $300 million worth of TUSD for USDT. Experts like Ashton Addison and Carlos Mercado have expressed concerns over the stablecoin's ability to maintain its peg and the importance of monitoring market cap versus liquidity. The sell-off may be linked to a recent $100 million exploit on the Poloniex exchange. The situation has raised questions about TUSD's stability and the confidence of users in the stablecoin market.

detailed_analysis.title: Suspected Market Maneuvers by Whales Including Justin Sun to Stabilize TUSD Peg
detailed_analysis.body: It is suspected that two whales, including Justin Sun, bought TUSD to restore its peg. On January 18th, whale TT2T17, allegedly Justin Sun, destroyed 104 million TUSD after detaching, and then deposited 200 million USDT into Binance, and withdrew 139.56 million TUSD from Binance. Another whale, TGIWRO, withdrew 31.6 million TUSD from Binance and deposited it into JustLend after detaching, then borrowed 18.97 million SDT from JustLend and deposited it into Binance.

detailed_analysis.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Depegging Raises Concerns, Impact on Major Cryptos and ScapesMania Presale Highlighted
detailed_analysis.body: The cryptocurrency market is facing challenges as the stablecoin TrueUSD (TUSD) loses its peg to the dollar, trading below its intended 1:1 value. This depegging began around January 15 and has led to over $340 million worth of TUSD being sold in the last 24 hours, causing concerns about the stability of TUSD's reserves. Other major cryptocurrencies like Polygon (MATIC), Solana (SOL), and Polkadot (DOT) may also be affected by this instability. Meanwhile, ScapesMania (MANIA), a presale gaming ecosystem project, is gaining attention for its potential in the crypto market. Polygon (MATIC) is experiencing fluctuations and partnerships, while Solana (SOL) is preparing for the altcoin season with its high throughput and low transaction costs. Polkadot (DOT) is maintaining momentum with growth in its staking ecosystem and transactional activities, despite a recent bearish trend in price.

detailed_analysis.title: MooreHK Commences Auditing Services for TUSD, Reveals Reserve Fund Details
detailed_analysis.body: MooreHK, a well-known accounting firm, has officially started providing auditing services for TUSD. According to a BlockBeats report on January 16th, MooreHK has begun its partnership with the network firm, integrating their technology solutions. The upgraded audit report also disclosed further details about the reserve funds of TUSD held in custody by its financial and trust partners.

detailed_analysis.title: True USD (TUSD) Depreciates Below $1 Peg Amidst Market Concerns and Binance's Shift in Focus
detailed_analysis.body: True USD (TUSD), the fifth-largest stablecoin, has fallen below its $1 peg, marking the deepest drop since its launch six years ago. Market observers noted a significant increase in TUSD sell orders on Binance, with nearly $128 million flowing out of the exchange. Concurrently, Tether (USDT) experienced an increase in capital, suggesting a shift in preference among investors. Concerns about TUSD's under-collateralization arose due to difficulties in accessing real-time attestations of its reserves. Binance's decision to exclude TUSD from its Manta Launchpad and the removal of zero-fee trading for TUSD have contributed to the stablecoin's decline, while Binance's new stablecoin, FDUSD, has seen growth.

detailed_analysis.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Drops to $0.99 Following Binance Launchpad Project Announcement
detailed_analysis.body: TrueUSD (TUSD) has experienced a slight depeg from its usual $1 value, dropping to $0.99. This devaluation occurred after Binance, a major cryptocurrency exchange, announced its 44th Launchpad project, Manta, without including TUSD as one of the stakable cryptocurrencies. Instead, BNB and FDUSD were selected for the project. The exclusion of TUSD from the project appears to have led to a negative reaction from some users, resulting in a sell-off that drove the price down. Notably, TUSD has not seen a drop to this level in the past year. Meanwhile, FDUSD, another stablecoin promoted by Binance after the shelving of BUSD, has seen its market value surpass TUSD, and its price has risen slightly above the norm, similar to the increase observed in BNB.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance's Simple Earn Platform Launches TUSD Flexible Savings Product Campaign.
detailed_analysis.body: According to an official announcement from BlockBeats on January 10th, Binance's Simple Earn platform has launched a TUSD current product promotion. The participation method is first come, first served. During the promotion period, subscribing to the TUSD current product on the platform not only earns real-time annualized returns but also enjoys 8% exclusive additional graded annualized returns.

detailed_analysis.body:
BlockBeats News, on December 26th, according to the official announcement, Binance's new coin mining has launched its 42nd project - Sleepless AI (AI), a Web3+AI gaming platform. 

Users can invest BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD into the AI mining pool on the Launchpad website after 08:00 on December 28th, 2023 (GMT+8) to receive AI rewards. AI can be mined for a total of 7 days. 

Binance will list Sleepless AI (AI) on January 4th, 2024 at 18:00 (GMT+8) and open AI/BTC, AI/USDT, AI/BNB, AI/FDUSD, AI/TUSD, and AI/TRY trading markets, applying seed label trading rules.

detailed_analysis.title: TUSD can currently be obtained through the Binance Web3 wallet.
detailed_analysis.body: According to official sources on December 26th, TUSD can now be obtained through the Binance Web3 wallet, and users can trade TUSD on the four major networks of BSC, ETH, Arbitrum, and Avalanche. TrueUSD (TUSD) is the first stablecoin anchored to the US dollar and provides on-chain real-time verification by an independent third-party institution. It is currently listed on over 100 trading platforms such as Binance and HTX and is circulating on more than ten mainstream public chains, including Ethereum, Tron, Avalanche, BNB Chain, Fantom, and Polygon. TUSD has long been committed to setting a benchmark for transparency in the stablecoin ecosystem and has provided a new example for the industry in terms of reserve audits and on-chain reserve proofs.

detailed_analysis.body: TrueUSD partners with MooreHK for daily attestations, fortifying transparency and trust in crypto, marking a significant industry leap.

detailed_analysis.title: launched on Binance's new coin mining Fair Mode, with NFPrompt (NFP) being mined using BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD
detailed_analysis.body:
BlockBeats news, on December 19th, according to official sources, Binance's new coin mining Fair Mode launched its 41st project, NFPrompt (NFP), which can be mined using BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD. Users can deposit BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD into the NFP mining pool on the Launchpad website after 08:00 on December 20th (UTC+8) to receive NFP rewards. NFP can be mined for a total of 7 days.

Fair Mode is a new mode launched by Binance Launchpool. The tokens issued under this mode will have a significantly increased initial circulation (all Launchpool tokens will be released before listing) to protect the community and retail investors and maximize user benefits. In addition, it will permanently block a portion of the allocation from entering circulation to further reduce inflationary pressures. For more details, please refer to the exploration of token economic models and development.

According to the Binance announcement, NFPrompt (NFP) is an AI-driven user-generated content (UGC) platform for Web3 creators.

detailed_analysis.title: Stablecoin TUSD has established a partnership with the spot trading platform Bybit.
detailed_analysis.body:

By pledging TUSD for current financial management, users can enjoy a 10% annualized interest rate and share a prize pool of 50,000 TUSD. In addition, trading TUSD/USDT on Bybit has zero fees.

TrueUSD (TUSD) is the first stablecoin anchored to the US dollar and validated in real-time on the blockchain by an independent third-party. TUSD is committed to promoting the adoption of cryptocurrency payments on various platforms and is currently listed on over 100 trading platforms, including Binance and HTX. It is also circulating on more than ten mainstream public chains such as Ethereum, TRON, Avalanche, and BNB Chain, and has become an important payment method for well-known Web3 applications such as UQUID, Travala.com, and CryptoWallet.com.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance will add spot trading pairs for DOT/TUSD and GALA/FDUSD, as well as trading bot services.
detailed_analysis.body:
According to an official announcement from BlockBeats on November 22nd, Binance will launch the following spot trading pairs on November 23rd, 2023 at 16:00 (GMT+8): DOT/TUSD, GALA/FDUSD, GAS/TRY, NTRN/TRY, and WLD/FDUSD.

In addition, Binance will offer trading bot services for the following trading pairs starting from the same time: spot grid, spot DCA (dollar-cost averaging), and intelligent position management for BEAMX/USDT.

The newsletter also highlights the rise of oracle-free protocols in DeFi and provides a list of recommended podcasts and resources for learning about crypto.

detailed_analysis.title: The Good, The Bad & The Institutions

BlackRock has filed for a spot Bitcoin ETF, DeutscheBank applied for regulatory permission to offer a crypto custody service, and Mercedes is piloting an in-car app that displays digital art. Memeland launched a teleburn of its top-tier NFT, 'You the Real MVP', and Stickies partnered with OPJ to animate NFTs into dynamic GIFs. However, Yuga faced FUD, Machi sued Zachxbt for defamation, and Elena postponed her drop due to allegations of copied art.

detailed_analysis.title: WAXBlock.io V1.0.3 Release Notes
detailed_analysis.body: WAXBlock.io introduces new features, including multiple account sign-in, enhanced search, chain and protocol features, and improved token transfers. Users can now transfer stake to a new account and view account keys in PUB_K1 format. The update also includes milliseconds in blocks and transactions, a name bids page, a voting page with proxies and producers, and improved transaction readability. Bugs have been fixed, and more enhancements are expected in future releases.

detailed_analysis.title: How to Claim Rewards
detailed_analysis.body: Claim your rewards on Vega by following these steps: 1) Connect your Vega wallet to the Governance dApp. 2) Check your rewards history. 3) Start the withdrawal process by selecting the asset type and entering your Ethereum wallet address. 4) Release your funds and they will be withdrawn to your Ethereum wallet. Vega is a decentralized network creating a new financial system that gives control to the community. #FreeTheMarkets.

detailed_analysis.title: Introducing the "Drop It Like It's DOT" Campaign: Predict with DOT
Five Years of EURS Stablecoin Journey
detailed_analysis.body: STASIS celebrates the fifth anniversary of its EURS stablecoin, the first euro-backed digital asset. The company has achieved numerous milestones, including partnerships with exchanges and liquidity providers, establishing institutional-grade infrastructure, and ensuring transparency through audits. EURS has also expanded its capabilities by becoming a multi-chain asset and competing confidently in the DeFi arena. STASIS has launched a zero-gas stablecoin wallet and plans to offer narrow banking services, providing customers with unparalleled security and stability.

detailed_analysis.title: KYVE Launches First Mainnet Data Pool: Cosmos Hub, Activating Its Protocol Layer
detailed_analysis.body: KYVE has launched its first mainnet data pool on the Cosmos Hub, enabling the archiving and validation of Cosmos Hub data in a decentralized manner. This data pool will provide trustless data to interchain builders, validators, and other participants, making it easier for them to access historical blockchain data. The pool will also support secure data analysis and be beneficial for interchain hackathons and grant programs. KYVE's protocol layer consists of data pools, with each pool having 50 open protocol validator slots. The data is stored using Bundlr, which provides instant finality for Arweave. The pool is funded by the KYVE Foundation and participants can join by holding $KYVE tokens.

detailed_analysis.title: Announcing The Inaugural Real-World Asset Summit
detailed_analysis.body: Applications are open for the Real-World Asset Summit, a gathering of top minds in TradFi and DeFi to discuss tokenization, credit, and crypto. The event aims to bring together investors, asset managers, founders, policymakers, and regulators to shape the future of finance and technology. Limited to 250 senior-level attendees, the summit will feature high-caliber programming, curated experiences, and networking opportunities. The event will take place on September 19th, 2023, at The William Vale in New York City.

Download the required wallets and follow the instructions to bridge tokens between different networks. Join the Telegram group for more information.

detailed_analysis.title: Weekly Update - DeFi and Layer 1 & Layer 2 News (Week 25,15/06/2023 - 21/06/2023)
detailed_analysis.body: zkSync Era, a scaling solution for Ethereum, has reached over $500 million in total value locked (TVL), becoming the third-largest scaling solution. Other developments include a proposal to increase the maximum validator balance on Ethereum, Tether experiencing a dip below its dollar peg, and Uniswap naming preferred bridges for cross-chain deployments. Polkadot revamped its governance system, Polygon proposed an upgrade to its Proof-of-Stake chain, and Binance introduced opBNB, an EVM-compatible Layer-2 testnet chain. Frax Finance plans to launch its own Ethereum Layer-2 blockchain, and EigenLayer's restaking smart contracts reached their limit on the first day.

detailed_analysis.title: SlowMist: The Ultimate Guide to Supply Chain Security in the Web3 Industry
detailed_analysis.body: The SlowMist security team provides recommendations for enhancing supply chain security in the Web3 industry, focusing on source code security, build security, transmission security, artifact security, and deployment security. They suggest using code management solutions, conducting code scanning, implementing CI/CD, ensuring material security, automating the build process, controlling network access, verifying artifacts, and securing deployments. These measures aim to mitigate the risks of supply chain attacks and create a secure development environment for the Web3 industry.

These actions include minting or buying the Gemesis NFT, buying and listing NFTs on OpenSea, and using OpenSea Pro to sweep or make offers on NFT collections.

detailed_analysis.body: Petra Mobile, the new app for Aptos blockchain, is now available on Google Play and Apple App Stores. With billions of Android and iPhone users, it aims to onboard the next wave of Web3 users. The app offers versatility, reliability, and safety, allowing users to store assets, transact with friends, and connect with apps on the Aptos blockchain. It supports all tokens, provides control and transparency with features like transaction simulation and gas customization, and prioritizes security as a self-custodial wallet. Users can download the app today for a new level of freedom and flexibility in managing their assets on Aptos.

The platform offers fast historical charts and aims to teach traders how to make good judgments without losing money. WuuTrade is free and includes artificial intelligence mechanics to help users become better traders. It also features various match options and a leaderboard. The platform will soon include an order routing system and AI tips for traders.

detailed_analysis.title: Doge Takes On Big Crypto
detailed_analysis.body: BlackRock, the world's largest asset manager, has applied to launch a Bitcoin ETF, signaling the entrance of big money into digital currencies. This development makes Dogecoin more important as it offers a grassroots alternative to big crypto and is resistant to corporate control. While Bitcoin is being embraced by institutions, Dogecoin has the potential to become the preferred coin for the creator's economy, supporting independent journalists, artists, and other creators. With BlackRock's move, it becomes crucial to maintain Dogecoin's branding as "the people's crypto" to avoid replicating the failures of the current monetary system.

detailed_analysis.title: Bi-weekly update, 20 June 2023
detailed_analysis.body: Rocket Pool, Ethereum's decentralized liquid staking protocol, has seen significant growth in rETH supply, active minipool count, and node operator count. The protocol has also released an update and made progress in various areas such as onchain voting, website development, and integration with other DeFi protocols. Rocket Pool has received media coverage and listings on several exchanges. The protocol aims to provide a non-custodial solution for liquid staking, with node operators economically aligned to benefit stakers.

detailed_analysis.title: VirtuSwap Partners With bloXroute To Launch The First Polygon DEX With Built-In Frontrunning…
detailed_analysis.body: VirtuSwap partners with bloXroute to launch the first Polygon DEX with built-in frontrunning protection. The partnership integrates bloXroute's MEV Protect Engine into VirtuSwap's platform to protect users from losses caused by frontrunning and sandwich attacks. This collaboration ensures users have access to the best asset prices and lowest trading fees while safeguarding VirtuSwap's liquidity-rebalancing transactions. bloXroute's solution is versatile and can be used by retail traders, professional algo-traders, and integrated into DeFi projects and platforms.

detailed_analysis.body: Tether and Bitfinex collaborate to provide public grant for Qubes OS development.

detailed_analysis.body: Mean Finance is a DeFi product that uses dollar-cost averaging (DCA) to automatically buy and sell cryptocurrencies at regular intervals. It recently launched its testnet on the Base Network and has hinted at a future $MEAN token airdrop for early users. To participate, users need to connect their wallets to the platform and engage in trading activities on supported networks. Regular participation increases the chances of receiving the airdrop.

detailed_analysis.title: Nautilus Chain — Confirmed Airdrop Guide [UPDATE]
detailed_analysis.body: Nautilus Chain is a modular chain that combines the speed of Solana with the decentralization of Ethereum. It is the fastest EVM chain available and allows for parallel transaction processing. Users can participate in the Nautilus Chain testnet, join a knowledge contest, and earn rewards through the referral program. Stay tuned for more updates and airdrops.

detailed_analysis.title: Market Pulse by the Crypto.com Research & Insights Team (Week 25,15/06/2023 - 19/06/2023)
detailed_analysis.body: EigenLayer, a new staking protocol for Ethereum, allows stakers to secure other projects. Liquid restaking is gaining traction, while native restaking is at close to 1,600 ETH. Bitcoin was up +2.1% and Ethereum fell -1.0% in the past week. BlackRock filed for a spot bitcoin ETF, Ethscriptions launched a protocol for creating and sharing digital objects on Ethereum, and the US Federal Reserve kept interest rates unchanged. Tether de-pegged but recovered, attributed to mass selling within DeFi protocols. Research reports explore memes and the performance of asset classes.

detailed_analysis.title: Riding the FUD Wave: Crypto Exploit and the Tug-of-War of Stablecoin Stability
detailed_analysis.body: Hong Kong lawmaker invites Coinbase and other crypto exchanges to register in the region as regulatory uncertainty persists in the US. Meanwhile, Polygon introduces Polygon 2.0 to address Ethereum's scalability issues, and EigenLayer goes live on the Ethereum network, enabling users to stake and validate third-party services. Tether's USDT stablecoin depegs from its $1 value, while Hashflow suffers a white hat hacker exploit. Celsius revises its bankruptcy filing and plans to convert customer altcoins to Bitcoin and Ether.

detailed_analysis.title: Zerion’s CMO reveals the most promising products & trends in Web3 for 2023-2024
detailed_analysis.body: The Epic Web3 Conference, held on June 9, was hailed as a content-rich experience and compared to "The Lord of the Rings" trilogy. The conference recordings are now available, featuring 20+ case studies. In an exclusive interview, Zerion's CMO shared insights on promising Web3 products, including Lens Protocol and Farcaster, as well as the most funded industries in the coming years, such as digital fashion. Additionally, the interview discussed the future of Web3, highlighting wallet-based trends and the merging of on-chain and off-chain identities. DFINITY is offering grants of $220 million for Web3 builders, while the BlockDown Festival in Portugal offers discounted tickets and features speakers from major brands and Web3 powerhouses.

detailed_analysis.title: DotLeap 126 - OpenGov live on Polkadot
detailed_analysis.body: Polkadot v0.9.43 released, OpenGov approved, and various funding motions approved. Kusama sees approved proposals and failed referendums. Updates from Acala, Astar, HydraDX, Moonbeam, and more.

detailed_analysis.title: DotLeap 126 - OpenGov live on Polkadot
detailed_analysis.body: Summary: Acala, Moonbeam, and Astar make significant developments in the blockchain space, including an exodus plan, routed liquidity, and the unveiling of Astar 2.0.

detailed_analysis.title: Theta Hackathon profile: Grand Prize winner ChainSmith
detailed_analysis.body: ChainSmith, the Grand Prize winner of the Theta Hackathon, is a management tool that simplifies the creation and deployment of subchains on the Theta Network. It allows users to easily create, manage, and maintain subchains without extensive knowledge of the underlying infrastructure. ChainSmith, developed by FuelFoundry, integrates Theta.JS and Theta Metachain SDK to enable the launch of Theta subchains. With strong encryption and a user-friendly interface, ChainSmith opens up Theta Metachain development to a wider range of developers. Congratulations to ChainSmith on their success!

They highlight the near-perfect speech-to-text recognition but admit to needing to learn how to format text and perform various functions. They anticipate that voice input will become a habit and foresee writing more blog posts using this method.

detailed_analysis.body: Blackrock's plan to launch a Bitcoin ETF suggests they are bullish on the future of crypto. Despite recent SEC actions against crypto, the government and Wall Street seem to be collaborating on the industry.

extracted_news.title: BIT.STORE Partners with TrueUSD to Offer TUSD for Card Recharge
extracted_news.body: BIT.STORE has announced a new partnership with TrueUSD (TUSD) to integrate the stablecoin as a recharge option for its crypto card services. This collaboration aims to provide BIT.STORE users with a secure and simple financial service experience. TUSD is known for its reliability, being pegged to the US dollar and offering transparency through third-party verified real-time attestations of its reserve holdings. The partnership is part of BIT.STORE's efforts to expand its service portfolio, which includes plans for a mobile app, an ambassador program, and additional top-up options. Meanwhile, TUSD experienced a temporary de-pegging, dropping to $0.9712 before nearing its stable value again at $0.9905.

extracted_news.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Stability Wavers as Value Falls Below $1 Peg
extracted_news.body: Stablecoin TrueUSD (TUSD) has experienced a significant devaluation, dropping below its $1 peg to around $0.97, amid a massive sell-off on Binance. Over the past five days, TUSD has seen net outflows of $279 million. The instability began on January 15 when traders sold over $300 million worth of TUSD for USDT. Experts like Ashton Addison and Carlos Mercado have expressed concerns over the stablecoin's ability to maintain its peg and the importance of monitoring market cap versus liquidity. The sell-off may be linked to a recent $100 million exploit on the Poloniex exchange. The situation has raised questions about TUSD's stability and the confidence of users in the stablecoin market.

extracted_news.title: Suspected Market Maneuvers by Whales Including Justin Sun to Stabilize TUSD Peg
extracted_news.body: It is suspected that two whales, including Justin Sun, bought TUSD to restore its peg. On January 18th, whale TT2T17, allegedly Justin Sun, destroyed 104 million TUSD after detaching, and then deposited 200 million USDT into Binance, and withdrew 139.56 million TUSD from Binance. Another whale, TGIWRO, withdrew 31.6 million TUSD from Binance and deposited it into JustLend after detaching, then borrowed 18.97 million SDT from JustLend and deposited it into Binance.

extracted_news.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Depegging Raises Concerns, Impact on Major Cryptos and ScapesMania Presale Highlighted
extracted_news.body: The cryptocurrency market is facing challenges as the stablecoin TrueUSD (TUSD) loses its peg to the dollar, trading below its intended 1:1 value. This depegging began around January 15 and has led to over $340 million worth of TUSD being sold in the last 24 hours, causing concerns about the stability of TUSD's reserves. Other major cryptocurrencies like Polygon (MATIC), Solana (SOL), and Polkadot (DOT) may also be affected by this instability. Meanwhile, ScapesMania (MANIA), a presale gaming ecosystem project, is gaining attention for its potential in the crypto market. Polygon (MATIC) is experiencing fluctuations and partnerships, while Solana (SOL) is preparing for the altcoin season with its high throughput and low transaction costs. Polkadot (DOT) is maintaining momentum with growth in its staking ecosystem and transactional activities, despite a recent bearish trend in price.

extracted_news.title: MooreHK Commences Auditing Services for TUSD, Reveals Reserve Fund Details
extracted_news.body: MooreHK, a well-known accounting firm, has officially started providing auditing services for TUSD. According to a BlockBeats report on January 16th, MooreHK has begun its partnership with the network firm, integrating their technology solutions. The upgraded audit report also disclosed further details about the reserve funds of TUSD held in custody by its financial and trust partners.

extracted_news.title: True USD (TUSD) Depreciates Below $1 Peg Amidst Market Concerns and Binance's Shift in Focus
extracted_news.body: True USD (TUSD), the fifth-largest stablecoin, has fallen below its $1 peg, marking the deepest drop since its launch six years ago. Market observers noted a significant increase in TUSD sell orders on Binance, with nearly $128 million flowing out of the exchange. Concurrently, Tether (USDT) experienced an increase in capital, suggesting a shift in preference among investors. Concerns about TUSD's under-collateralization arose due to difficulties in accessing real-time attestations of its reserves. Binance's decision to exclude TUSD from its Manta Launchpad and the removal of zero-fee trading for TUSD have contributed to the stablecoin's decline, while Binance's new stablecoin, FDUSD, has seen growth.

extracted_news.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Drops to $0.99 Following Binance Launchpad Project Announcement
extracted_news.body: TrueUSD (TUSD) has experienced a slight depeg from its usual $1 value, dropping to $0.99. This devaluation occurred after Binance, a major cryptocurrency exchange, announced its 44th Launchpad project, Manta, without including TUSD as one of the stakable cryptocurrencies. Instead, BNB and FDUSD were selected for the project. The exclusion of TUSD from the project appears to have led to a negative reaction from some users, resulting in a sell-off that drove the price down. Notably, TUSD has not seen a drop to this level in the past year. Meanwhile, FDUSD, another stablecoin promoted by Binance after the shelving of BUSD, has seen its market value surpass TUSD, and its price has risen slightly above the norm, similar to the increase observed in BNB.

During the promotion period, subscribing to the TUSD current product on the platform not only earns real-time annualized returns but also enjoys 8% exclusive additional graded annualized returns.

extracted_news.title: KYVE Launches First Mainnet Data Pool: Cosmos Hub, Activating Its Protocol Layer
extracted_news.body: KYVE has launched its first mainnet data pool on the Cosmos Hub, enabling the archiving and validation of Cosmos Hub data in a decentralized manner. This data pool will provide trustless data to interchain builders, validators, and other participants, making it easier for them to access historical blockchain data. The pool will also support secure data analysis and be beneficial for interchain hackathons and grant programs. KYVE's protocol layer consists of data pools, with each pool having 50 open protocol validator slots. The data is stored using Bundlr, which provides instant finality for Arweave. The pool is funded by the KYVE Foundation and participants can join by holding $KYVE tokens.

extracted_news.title: VirtuSwap Partners With bloXroute To Launch The First Polygon DEX With Built-In Frontrunning…

This collaboration ensures users have access to the best asset prices and lowest trading fees while safeguarding VirtuSwap's liquidity-rebalancing transactions. bloXroute's solution is versatile and can be used by retail traders, professional algo-traders, and integrated into DeFi projects and platforms.

extracted_news.title: #68 Macro Waves, Crypto Currents
extracted_news.body: Crypto market influenced by macro factors and regulatory uncertainty. Uniswap unveils V4 with innovative design decisions. USDT experiences temporary depegging, Tether demonstrates transparency. Polygon focuses on creating value layer on Ethereum. Blackrock files for spot Bitcoin ETF. Andreessen Horowitz emphasizes decentralization. Tips on engaging with audited protocols for security.

extracted_news.title: DerpDEX Airdrop Confirmed — Incentivized Testnet
extracted_news.body: DerpDEX is a meme-able DEX on zkSync, offering a concentrated liquidity DEX and all-in-1 DeFi ecosystem. They recently launched their testnet and are offering airdrops. Follow their socials, add zkSync ERA Testnet to your wallet, and participate in swaps and liquidity pools to qualify. Visit their website for more details.

extracted_news.title: Mean Finance [Base] — Potential Airdrop Guide
extracted_news.body: Mean Finance is a DeFi product that uses dollar-cost averaging (DCA) to automatically buy and sell cryptocurrencies at regular intervals. It recently launched its testnet on the Base Network and has hinted at a future $MEAN token airdrop for early users. To participate, users need to connect their wallets to the platform and engage in trading activities on supported networks. Regular participation increases the chances of receiving the airdrop.

extracted_news.title: Nautilus Chain — Confirmed Airdrop Guide [UPDATE]
extracted_news.body: Nautilus Chain is a modular chain that combines the speed of Solana with the decentralization of Ethereum. It is the fastest EVM chain available and allows for parallel transaction processing. Users can participate in the Nautilus Chain testnet, join a knowledge contest, and earn rewards through the referral program. Stay tuned for more updates and airdrops.

extracted_news.title: Market Pulse by the Crypto.com Research & Insights Team (Week 25,15/06/2023 - 19/06/2023)
extracted_news.body: EigenLayer, a new staking protocol for Ethereum, allows stakers to secure other projects. Liquid restaking is gaining traction, while native restaking is at close to 1,600 ETH. Bitcoin was up +2.1% and Ethereum fell -1.0% in the past week. BlackRock filed for a spot bitcoin ETF, Ethscriptions launched a protocol for creating and sharing digital objects on Ethereum, and the US Federal Reserve kept interest rates unchanged. Tether de-pegged but recovered, attributed to mass selling within DeFi protocols. Research reports explore memes and the performance of asset classes.

extracted_news.title: Riding the FUD Wave: Crypto Exploit and the Tug-of-War of Stablecoin Stability
extracted_news.body: Hong Kong lawmaker invites Coinbase and other crypto exchanges to register in the region as regulatory uncertainty persists in the US. Meanwhile, Polygon introduces Polygon 2.0 to address Ethereum's scalability issues, and EigenLayer goes live on the Ethereum network, enabling users to stake and validate third-party services. Tether's USDT stablecoin depegs from its $1 value, while Hashflow suffers a white hat hacker exploit. Celsius revises its bankruptcy filing and plans to convert customer altcoins to Bitcoin and Ether.

extracted_news.title: Zerion’s CMO reveals the most promising products & trends in Web3 for 2023-2024
extracted_news.body: The Epic Web3 Conference, held on June 9, was hailed as a content-rich experience and compared to "The Lord of the Rings" trilogy. The conference recordings are now available, featuring 20+ case studies. In an exclusive interview, Zerion's CMO shared insights on promising Web3 products, including Lens Protocol and Farcaster, as well as the most funded industries in the coming years, such as digital fashion. Additionally, the interview discussed the future of Web3, highlighting wallet-based trends and the merging of on-chain and off-chain identities. DFINITY is offering grants of $220 million for Web3 builders, while the BlockDown Festival in Portugal offers discounted tickets and features speakers from major brands and Web3 powerhouses.

extracted_news.title: DotLeap 126 - OpenGov live on Polkadot
extracted_news.body: Polkadot v0.9.43 released, OpenGov approved, and various funding motions approved. Kusama sees approved proposals and failed referendums. Updates from Acala, Astar, HydraDX, Moonbeam, and more.

extracted_news.title: DotLeap 126 - OpenGov live on Polkadot
extracted_news.body: Summary: Acala, Moonbeam, and Astar make significant developments in the blockchain space, including an exodus plan, routed liquidity, and the unveiling of Astar 2.0.

extracted_news.title: Theta Hackathon profile: Grand Prize winner ChainSmith
extracted_news.body: ChainSmith, the Grand Prize winner of the Theta Hackathon, is a management tool that simplifies the creation and deployment of subchains on the Theta Network. It allows users to easily create, manage, and maintain subchains without extensive knowledge of the underlying infrastructure. ChainSmith, developed by FuelFoundry, integrates Theta.JS and Theta Metachain SDK to enable the launch of Theta subchains. With strong encryption and a user-friendly interface, ChainSmith opens up Theta Metachain development to a wider range of developers. Congratulations to ChainSmith on their success!

extracted_news.body: Bitfinex Pay Merchant Dashboard gets new updates for managing Merchant crypto gateway.

extracted_news.body: US wholesale prices decline in May, indicating a potential slowdown in inflation. Supply chain disruptions and rising input costs may impact the economy.

extracted_news.title: Voice Input
extracted_news.body: The author reflects on their recent adoption of voice input on their smartphone, which they attribute to a dislike of typing on a small screen. They highlight the near-perfect speech-to-text recognition but admit to needing to learn how to format text and perform various functions. They anticipate that voice input will become a habit and foresee writing more blog posts using this method.

extracted_news.title: Airdrop | EtherMail Airdrop, First Web3 mailbox: Get EMC Tokens | by OxWeb3 | Jun, 2023 | Medium
extracted_news.body: EtherMail is a revolutionary email platform that combines web 2.0 and web 3.0 technologies, offering anonymous and encrypted wallet-to-wallet communication. Users have full ownership and control of their inbox and can earn rewards for reading relevant content. The platform also allows companies to send targeted content to asset holders based on real-time blockchain information. Users can earn EMC tokens by connecting their wallet, inviting friends, and reading emails. The platform recently raised $3M in a seed round and is currently in the beta testing phase.

extracted_news.title: The Secret Company That Owns the World…Has Entered the Bitcoin Market
extracted_news.body: Blackrock, the world's most influential investment company, has applied for a Bitcoin Spot ETF. If approved, this could bring legitimacy and billions of dollars into the Bitcoin market, pushing its price over $100k.

extracted_news.title: Bitcoin's Exchange Exodus: From Three-Year Low to Binance's Crypto Chaos!
extracted_news.body: Bitcoin supply on exchanges hits three-year low as traders opt for self-custody amid regulatory risks. Binance faces SEC charges, staff layoffs, Netherlands exit, and French investigation.

extracted_news.title: Blackrock’s Latest Move Proves the US Has No Intention to Kill Crypto
extracted_news.body: Blackrock's plan to launch a Bitcoin ETF suggests they are bullish on the future of crypto. Despite recent SEC actions against crypto, the government and Wall Street seem to be collaborating on the industry.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance to Remove Select BNB and TUSD Trading Pairs on April 12
detailed_analysis.body: Binance will remove a small number of BNB and TUSD trading pairs on April 12. According to BlockBeats, on April 10, according to official news, Binance will remove BAKE/BNB, ID/TUSD, MBOX/BNB, OP/TUSD, RDNT/TUSD, and UNI/BNB trading pairs at 11:00 Beijing time on April 12.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance to Remove LDO/TUSD and WING/BTC Spot Trading Pairs
detailed_analysis.body: Binance announced it will remove the LDO/TUSD and WING/BTC spot trading pairs on April 5, 2024, at 11:00 Eastern Time, according to an official announcement reported by BlockBeats on April 3.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance to Delist GNS/BTC and XVG/TUSD Trading Pairs
detailed_analysis.body: Binance will delist GNS/BTC and XVG/TUSD spot trading pairs on March 29th, according to an official announcement. The decision comes as a result of a recent review.

detailed_analysis.title: TUSD Market Value Plummets Over 50% in Eight Days
detailed_analysis.body: TUSD’s market value has decreased by more than 50% since March 15 to $618 million. According to BlockBeats news, on March 23, according to CoinGecko data, the market value of TUSD has dropped from US$1.29 billion to the current US$618 million since March 15, a decrease of 52.09%.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance will delist trading pairs such as ARPA/BNB and COMP/TUSD on March 15th.
detailed_analysis.body: BINANCE will delist trading pairs such as ARPA/BNB and COMP/TUSD on March 15th. According to an official announcement from Blockbeats on March 13th, Binance will delist the trading pairs of ARPA/BNB, COMP/TUSD, EDU/BNB, EDU/TUSD, PENDLE/TUSD, EDU/BNB, EDU/TUSD, and PENDLE/TUSD at 11:00 (UTC+8) on March 15th.

detailed_analysis.title: TUSD Resumes Peg, Trading at $0.9969 with 3.06% Increase
detailed_analysis.body: TUSD has now resumed its peg and is currently trading at $0.9969. According to BlockBeats news on February 29th, based on Binance market data, TUSD has now resumed its peg and is currently trading at 0.9969 US dollars, with a 24-hour increase of 3.06%.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance to Burn Large Amount of BUSD and TUSD B-Tokens
detailed_analysis.body: Binance announced on its social media platform that it will burn a large amount of BUSD and TUSD B-tokens today. It will then release an equivalent amount of tokens to be used as collateral on its native network. The announcement was reported by BlockBeats on February 22nd.

detailed_analysis.title: TUSD Listed on Indian Cryptocurrency Exchange CoinDCX
detailed_analysis.body: TUSD listed on Indian cryptocurrency exchange CoinDCX. BlockBeats news on February 4th: TUSD has been listed on Indian cryptocurrency exchange CoinDCX, offering a total of 20 trading pairs including BTC/TUSD, ETH/TUSD, SOL/TUSD, and BNB/TUSD, with plans for more collaborations in the future. CoinDCX is an Indian cryptocurrency exchange dedicated to providing simple crypto financial services to users, such as buying cryptocurrencies, wallet facilities, futures and margin trading, as well as staking and lending. It currently has over 14 million users.

detailed_analysis.title: HTX TURNS OFF PROOF-OF-RESERVES AS TUSD STRUGGLES TO HOLD ITS PEG
detailed_analysis.body: HTX turned off proof of reserves while TUSD, linked to HTX stakeholder Sun, loses dollar peg raising collateralization concerns

detailed_analysis.title: TUSD Launches on Bitci T\u00fcrkiye with Exclusive Staking Event
detailed_analysis.body: TUSD has been listed on the Turkish cryptocurrency exchange platform Bitci T\u00fcrkiye. The announcement was made on January 22nd, with an exclusive staking activity scheduled from January 25th to April 15th. The launch supports TRC20, ERC20, and BEP20 networks, and the trading pairs available are TUSD/TRY and TUSD/USDT.

detailed_analysis.title: BIT.STORE Partners with TrueUSD to Offer TUSD for Card Recharge
detailed_analysis.body: BIT.STORE has announced a new partnership with TrueUSD (TUSD) to integrate the stablecoin as a recharge option for its crypto card services. This collaboration aims to provide BIT.STORE users with a secure and simple financial service experience. TUSD is known for its reliability, being pegged to the US dollar and offering transparency through third-party verified real-time attestations of its reserve holdings. The partnership is part of BIT.STORE's efforts to expand its service portfolio, which includes plans for a mobile app, an ambassador program, and additional top-up options. Meanwhile, TUSD experienced a temporary de-pegging, dropping to $0.9712 before nearing its stable value again at $0.9905.

detailed_analysis.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Stability Wavers as Value Falls Below $1 Peg
detailed_analysis.body: Stablecoin TrueUSD (TUSD) has experienced a significant devaluation, dropping below its $1 peg to around $0.97, amid a massive sell-off on Binance. Over the past five days, TUSD has seen net outflows of $279 million. The instability began on January 15 when traders sold over $300 million worth of TUSD for USDT. Experts like Ashton Addison and Carlos Mercado have expressed concerns over the stablecoin's ability to maintain its peg and the importance of monitoring market cap versus liquidity. The sell-off may be linked to a recent $100 million exploit on the Poloniex exchange. The situation has raised questions about TUSD's stability and the confidence of users in the stablecoin market.

detailed_analysis.title: Suspected Market Maneuvers by Whales Including Justin Sun to Stabilize TUSD Peg
detailed_analysis.body: It is suspected that two whales, including Justin Sun, bought TUSD to restore its peg. On January 18th, whale TT2T17, allegedly Justin Sun, destroyed 104 million TUSD after detaching, and then deposited 200 million USDT into Binance, and withdrew 139.56 million TUSD from Binance. Another whale, TGIWRO, withdrew 31.6 million TUSD from Binance and deposited it into JustLend after detaching, then borrowed 18.97 million SDT from JustLend and deposited it into Binance.

detailed_analysis.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Depegging Raises Concerns, Impact on Major Cryptos and ScapesMania Presale Highlighted
detailed_analysis.body: The cryptocurrency market is facing challenges as the stablecoin TrueUSD (TUSD) loses its peg to the dollar, trading below its intended 1:1 value. This depegging began around January 15 and has led to over $340 million worth of TUSD being sold in the last 24 hours, causing concerns about the stability of TUSD's reserves. Other major cryptocurrencies like Polygon (MATIC), Solana (SOL), and Polkadot (DOT) may also be affected by this instability. Meanwhile, ScapesMania (MANIA), a presale gaming ecosystem project, is gaining attention for its potential in the crypto market. Polygon (MATIC) is experiencing fluctuations and partnerships, while Solana (SOL) is preparing for the altcoin season with its high throughput and low transaction costs. Polkadot (DOT) is maintaining momentum with growth in its staking ecosystem and transactional activities, despite a recent bearish trend in price.

detailed_analysis.title: MooreHK Commences Auditing Services for TUSD, Reveals Reserve Fund Details
detailed_analysis.body: MooreHK, a well-known accounting firm, has officially started providing auditing services for TUSD. According to a BlockBeats report on January 16th, MooreHK has begun its partnership with the network firm, integrating their technology solutions. The upgraded audit report also disclosed further details about the reserve funds of TUSD held in custody by its financial and trust partners.

detailed_analysis.title: True USD (TUSD) Depreciates Below $1 Peg Amidst Market Concerns and Binance's Shift in Focus
detailed_analysis.body: True USD (TUSD), the fifth-largest stablecoin, has fallen below its $1 peg, marking the deepest drop since its launch six years ago. Market observers noted a significant increase in TUSD sell orders on Binance, with nearly $128 million flowing out of the exchange. Concurrently, Tether (USDT) experienced an increase in capital, suggesting a shift in preference among investors. Concerns about TUSD's under-collateralization arose due to difficulties in accessing real-time attestations of its reserves. Binance's decision to exclude TUSD from its Manta Launchpad and the removal of zero-fee trading for TUSD have contributed to the stablecoin's decline, while Binance's new stablecoin, FDUSD, has seen growth.

detailed_analysis.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Drops to $0.99 Following Binance Launchpad Project Announcement
detailed_analysis.body: TrueUSD (TUSD) has experienced a slight depeg from its usual $1 value, dropping to $0.99. This devaluation occurred after Binance, a major cryptocurrency exchange, announced its 44th Launchpad project, Manta, without including TUSD as one of the stakable cryptocurrencies. Instead, BNB and FDUSD were selected for the project. The exclusion of TUSD from the project appears to have led to a negative reaction from some users, resulting in a sell-off that drove the price down. Notably, TUSD has not seen a drop to this level in the past year. Meanwhile, FDUSD, another stablecoin promoted by Binance after the shelving of BUSD, has seen its market value surpass TUSD, and its price has risen slightly above the norm, similar to the increase observed in BNB.

detailed_analysis.title: Binance's Simple Earn Platform Launches TUSD Flexible Savings Product Campaign.
detailed_analysis.body: According to an official announcement from BlockBeats on January 10th, Binance's Simple Earn platform has launched a TUSD current product promotion. The participation method is first come, first served. During the promotion period, subscribing to the TUSD current product on the platform not only earns real-time annualized returns but also enjoys 8% exclusive additional graded annualized returns.

detailed_analysis.body:
BlockBeats News, on December 26th, according to the official announcement, Binance's new coin mining has launched its 42nd project - Sleepless AI (AI), a Web3+AI gaming platform. 

Users can invest BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD into the AI mining pool on the Launchpad website after 08:00 on December 28th, 2023 (GMT+8) to receive AI rewards. AI can be mined for a total of 7 days. 

Binance will list Sleepless AI (AI) on January 4th, 2024 at 18:00 (GMT+8) and open AI/BTC, AI/USDT, AI/BNB, AI/FDUSD, AI/TUSD, and AI/TRY trading markets, applying seed label trading rules.

detailed_analysis.body: According to official sources on December 26th, TUSD can now be obtained through the Binance Web3 wallet, and users can trade TUSD on the four major networks of BSC, ETH, Arbitrum, and Avalanche. TrueUSD (TUSD) is the first stablecoin anchored to the US dollar and provides on-chain real-time verification by an independent third-party institution. It is currently listed on over 100 trading platforms such as Binance and HTX and is circulating on more than ten mainstream public chains, including Ethereum, Tron, Avalanche, BNB Chain, Fantom, and Polygon. TUSD has long been committed to setting a benchmark for transparency in the stablecoin ecosystem and has provided a new example for the industry in terms of reserve audits and on-chain reserve proofs.

detailed_analysis.title: launched on Binance's new coin mining Fair Mode, with NFPrompt (NFP) being mined using BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD
detailed_analysis.body:
BlockBeats news, on December 19th, according to official sources, Binance's new coin mining Fair Mode launched its 41st project, NFPrompt (NFP), which can be mined using BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD. Users can deposit BNB, FDUSD, and TUSD into the NFP mining pool on the Launchpad website after 08:00 on December 20th (UTC+8) to receive NFP rewards. NFP can be mined for a total of 7 days.

Fair Mode is a new mode launched by Binance Launchpool. The tokens issued under this mode will have a significantly increased initial circulation (all Launchpool tokens will be released before listing) to protect the community and retail investors and maximize user benefits. In addition, it will permanently block a portion of the allocation from entering circulation to further reduce inflationary pressures. For more details, please refer to the exploration of token economic models and development.

According to the Binance announcement, NFPrompt (NFP) is an AI-driven user-generated content (UGC) platform for Web3 creators.

TrueUSD (TUSD) is the first stablecoin anchored to the US dollar and validated in real-time on the blockchain by an independent third-party. detailed_analysis.body: WAXBlock.io introduces new features, including multiple account sign-in, enhanced search, chain and protocol features, and improved token transfers. detailed_analysis.title: Introducing the "Drop It Like It's DOT" Campaign: Predict with DOT
Five Years of EURS Stablecoin Journey
detailed_analysis.body: STASIS celebrates the fifth anniversary of its EURS stablecoin, the first euro-backed digital asset. The company has achieved numerous milestones, including partnerships with exchanges and liquidity providers, establishing institutional-grade infrastructure, and ensuring transparency through audits. EURS has also expanded its capabilities by becoming a multi-chain asset and competing confidently in the DeFi arena. STASIS has launched a zero-gas stablecoin wallet and plans to offer narrow banking services, providing customers with unparalleled security and stability.

detailed_analysis.title: KYVE Launches First Mainnet Data Pool: Cosmos Hub, Activating Its Protocol Layer
detailed_analysis.body: KYVE has launched its first mainnet data pool on the Cosmos Hub, enabling the archiving and validation of Cosmos Hub data in a decentralized manner. This data pool will provide trustless data to interchain builders, validators, and other participants, making it easier for them to access historical blockchain data. The pool will also support secure data analysis and be beneficial for interchain hackathons and grant programs. KYVE's protocol layer consists of data pools, with each pool having 50 open protocol validator slots. The data is stored using Bundlr, which provides instant finality for Arweave. The pool is funded by the KYVE Foundation and participants can join by holding $KYVE tokens.

detailed_analysis.title: Announcing The Inaugural Real-World Asset Summit
detailed_analysis.body: Applications are open for the Real-World Asset Summit, a gathering of top minds in TradFi and DeFi to discuss tokenization, credit, and crypto. The event aims to bring together investors, asset managers, founders, policymakers, and regulators to shape the future of finance and technology. Limited to 250 senior-level attendees, the summit will feature high-caliber programming, curated experiences, and networking opportunities. The event will take place on September 19th, 2023, at The William Vale in New York City.
